summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No.4950 for the improvement of Fletcher Street, from 50th Avenue South to 51st Avenue South; by constructing sewers and side sewers together with the necessary appurtenances, under Ordinance NO. 56821 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll , establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
